plot: Amrit's generosity and kindness initially lands him in the bad books of a dancer; then in prison; and then as false son-in-law of a very wealthy man.
title: Bade Dil Wala
plot_es: Amrit's generosity and kindness initially lands him in the bad books of a dancer; then in prison; and then as false son-in-law of a very wealthy man.
plot_en: Amrit's generosity and kindness initially lands him in the bad books of a dancer; then in prison; and then as false son-in-law of a very wealthy man.

cast.role: Amrit Kumar Saxena /              Vijay Kumar Gupta
cast.name: Rishi Kapoor
